content: https://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/06/11/AtvAw.pngTelegram: https://t.me/pptnairdropWelcome to PPTN! Join our team and participate in our rewards and in our two great AirdropsThe PPTN platform (loans for your business) is pleased to offer two Airdrops for the first time in history to introduce us to the crypto world. We want to implement the loan modality through our two tokens "PPTN" and "PPTN STAR".Token allocation:Social media Bounty- Telegram 100%Tokens will be distributed within 30 days after the end of the bounty campaign.Time frame:Week 1 | June 15 - June  21Week 2 | June 22 - June 28Week 3 | June 29 - July  06Week 4 | Jully 06 - July  13RULESFollow the steps of Telegram Group.Newbie and Brand new account  allowed to participateAirdrop will be send starting June 15th, 2023Proof Of Registration Format (All participants must send 1 time):Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:ERC20 Wallet Address:Weekly Report Format:Code:Week:Bitcointalk Username:Telegram Username:Spreadsheet No:Posts Url:1. …2. …3. …4. …5. …Google spreadsheet of the participants :  https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/15IKI2x4rbC4p3OH0_fI4HVTod06b25HL7HRYLbC-VGQ/edit#gid=0
